DOC.brief_title: The Effect Short-term Very Low Calorie Diet Heart Rate Variability Obese Individuals
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking men woman Aged 3265 year BMI 3042 kg/m2 History cardiovascular disease , diabetes , cancer , renal liver disease chronic gastrointestinal disorder Epileptic history fainting Adhered VLCD past 6 month History drug alcohol abuse include heavy drinking . Pregnancy , plan get pregnant breastfeeding Currently take medication control blood pressure Weight change 3kg past two month
